body_html:
@deepali-c

Yes. I want to build the detectron from Dockerfile with caffe2/cuda8.0-cudnn6-ubuntu16.04. Because, right now, I could only find docker image with caffe2/cuda9.0-cudnn7.

So, in order to build the detectron, I have to build caffe2 first. And everything go well, except

RUN mv /usr/local/caffe2 /usr/local/caffe2_build
ENV Caffe2_DIR /usr/local/caffe2_build
ENV PYTHONPATH /usr/local/caffe2_build:${PYTHONPATH}
ENV LD_LIBRARY_PATH /usr/local/caffe2_build/lib:${LD_LIBRARY_PATH}

any idea?
